name: Lampward Alpha 0.1
description:
THIS IS A MOON LOGIC ADVENTURE GAME.

This early Alpha has been made using only the generic RPGMaker assets. In this early edition, you will enjoy a discretionary peek into the world that the Lampward Enclave has left behind. A man, whose memories are uncertain, finds himself in those lands of misty swamps and oppressive moors which folk say the Lampward once protected and illuminated. 

A NOTE ON MOON LOGIC: Old fashioned adventure games often had bizarre puzzles with solutions that could not be easily ascertained; instead, through trial and error, and a sense of discovery, players would eventually figure out how these strange worlds were connected to understand them. This is currently a game with small stages, and if you know RPGM you understand how simple the variables involved are: you can move, you can interact, and you have an inventory. This is not a game to test your wits but a place to dwell in, a world to ruminate over. Some things are best considered rather than acted upon.

The ARROW KEYS will move you.

The ENTER key is your interact button.

By pressing ESC, you will enter the Menu: this is an RPGMaker game which comes with a preset Menu. You need only concern yourself, for now, with the INVENTORY.
